tagline: Autonomous lunar excavation for NASA Lunabotics.

hero.headline:
Born to win.
Built to prove it.
hero.subhead: We are an ambitious, interdisciplinary team of students across engineering, design, and business, united by a shared passion for advancing space technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: CMU MoonMiners seeks to set the standard for student-led large industry-like builds in space. We build ready systems with marginal risk on an extremely aggressive timeline, laying the groundwork for a landing rover robotic program at Carnegie Mellon.

bento.title: The cutting edge of planetary robotics
bento.updatesDescription: Setting the standard for student-led lunar robotics, building marginal-risk ready systems on an aggressive timeline.
bento.membersDescription: An interdisciplinary team across engineering, business, computer science and more
